definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: jian4 gou4 zheng4 yi4 li3 lun4

sentences.english: At the awards ceremony, the "Lifetime Achievement Award" went to Fu Zhengyi.
sentences.chinese: 在颁奖典礼上，傅正义获得“终生成就奖”。

sentences.english: Let's view justice in the large sense.
sentences.chinese: 让我们以大格局来检视正义。

sentences.english: I want know what the government can do , justice.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道政府能做什么，正义者。

sentences.english: In addition, he turned the justice anti-invasion war into absurdly indiscriminate rejection of everything foreign.
sentences.chinese: 把正义的反侵略的爱国主义变成了荒谬的盲目排外。

sentences.english: They turned down or gave up comfort and wealth in order to fight for what is right.
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝或放弃安逸与富有，为正义而斗争。

sentences.english: I would not have written, but justice requires my character to be defended.
sentences.chinese: 我本来可以不写，但正义要求我为自己的品格辩护。

sentences.english: Shendu can make for the realization of justice and fairness in social network.
sentences.chinese: 慎独有利于网络社会正义与公平的实现。

sentences.english: The man had a keen sense of justice and fair play.
sentences.chinese: 此人具有强烈的正义感，做事光明磊落。

sentences.english: They too have been deaf to the voice of justice and of consanguinity.
sentences.chinese: 可他们对这种正义和同宗的呼声也同样充耳不闻。

sentences.english: Justice, as well as the law, demands that these bandits be severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 法律和正义都要求严办这些匪徒。

sentences.english: The sight of an injustice offends the sense of justice.
sentences.chinese: 见不义之行则伤及正义之心。

sentences.english: For Christ is the aim of the Law and it is then that the believer reaches this righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 因为法律的终向是基督，使凡信他的人获得正义。

sentences.english: Everything you say adds up to justice.
sentences.chinese: 你所说的一切，总合起来就是正义。

sentences.english: This hero is upholds justly, subdues the unprincipled person is his only objective.
sentences.chinese: 这位英雄是主持正义的，制伏坏人是他的惟一宗旨。

sentences.english: The most odious of all oppressions are those which mask as justice.
sentences.chinese: 最可憎的压制总是戴着正义的面具。

definition: innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
to uphold virtue and condemn evil (idiom)
to uphold (e.g. justice or virtue)/to promote
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
